titles.title: Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
A bill to redesignate the Weir Farm National Historic Site in the State of Connecticut as the "Weir Farm National Historical Park".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 116-367.

bill.summary:
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
This bill redesignates the Weir Farm National Historic Site in Connecticut as the Weir Farm National Historical Park.
